means.word_mean: 爱人,恋人,情人,未婚夫,未婚妻

entry.def: You call someone sweetheart if you are very fond of them.
Your sweetheart is your boyfriend or your girlfriend.

example.ex: I married Shurla, my childhood sweetheart, in Liverpool.
example.tran: 我在利物浦和我青梅竹马的恋人舒拉结婚了。

means.word_mean: 1. a person loved by another person
3. a very attractive or seductive looking woman
1. privileged treatment of a favored person or corporation (sometimes unethically);

sentences.sentence: "another sweetheart deal based on political influence"

sentences.en: They were sweethearts for ten years before they married.
sentences.cn: 他们结婚之前恋爱了十年。

jushi.english: His sweetheart is a pretty girl.
jushi.chinese: 他的情人是一个可爱的女孩。

jushi.english: She supposes that her sweetheart will surely come.
jushi.chinese: 她认为她心爱的人一定会来。

jushi.english: I had thought she was also a “sweetheart”.
jushi.chinese: 我以为她也只是个“爱人”。
